pr_title: Avoiding ctl workload failure on some write failures

timeline.message: Avoiding ctl workload failure on some write failures

timeline.author: moderakh
moderakh

timeline.bodyText: We are not throwing error in case of pre-populating failures, is this intentional ?
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: Yes this is intentional , this was causing ctl failure if there was single failure on pre populated document create.
replies.author: simplynaveen20

timeline.bodyText: logging this as warning instead? Doesn't do any harm, correct?
timeline.author: FabianMeiswinkel

replies.bodyText: Thanks , that make sense , i will keep it in note and add in it next time when i touch ctl, need this to get merge now
replies.author: simplynaveen20
